trans-unit.source: How to: Populate an XML Tree with an XmlWriter (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 如何︰ 填充 XML 树使用 XmlWriter (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic 中) |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: How to: Populate an XML Tree with an XmlWriter (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 如何︰ 填充 XML 树使用 XmlWriter (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: One way to populate an XML tree is to use <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.CreateWriter%2A> to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>, and then write to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 填充 XML 树的一种方法是使用<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.CreateWriter%2A>创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>，然后将写入到<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.CreateWriter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML tree is populated with all nodes that are written to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 使用写入到<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>的所有节点，填充 XML 树

trans-unit.source: You would typically use this method when you use [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] with another class that expects to write to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>, such as <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用时，通常应使用此方法[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)]期望将写入到另一个类替换<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>，如<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: One possible use for <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.CreateWriter%2A> is when invoking an XSLT transformation.
trans-unit.target: 一个可能的用途<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.CreateWriter%2A>时，可以调用 XSLT 转换。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.CreateWriter%2A>

trans-unit.source: This example creates an XML tree, creates an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> from the XML tree, creates a new document, and then creates an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> to write into the new document.
trans-unit.target: 此示例中创建 XML 树，创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>从 XML 树中，创建一个新文档，然后创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>要写入到新文档。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: It then invokes the XSLT transformation, passing in <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 示例然后调用 XSLT 转换，传入<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: After the transformation successfully completes, the new XML tree is populated with the results of the transformation.
trans-unit.target: 在转换成功完成后，使用转换的结果，填充新的 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：
